name: KeyboyD & MouseMan
description:
A GMTK2021 Jam Game where the controls are incorrectly joined together, resulting in a difficult control scheme;

The Player(s):

 MouseMan: MouseMan is controlled with the three mouse buttons, left, right and middle click for jump.

KeyboyD: KeyboyD is a sort of mouse cursor on the screen, he can (mostly) anywhere, but he is controlled with WASD as if he were in a top-down RPG,

Use KeyboyD to assist MouseMan to the finish flag in the IMPOSSIBLE 6 Levels, you'll never be able to do it

There's like no sound because I ran out of time and couldn't figure it out lol
